attributes.action: outlaw anything to do with the green party, remove their rights to vote on anything to do with car's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like so many other hard working individuals are sick and tired of listening to these so called "Green" low lifes who have nothing better to do than burden even more debt on working people, industry and the UK in general. The government should come out with a law similar to the terrorist law to imprison or detain these idiots until they come to their senses.
